tns:patch.author: acartaleanu
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_project_age;
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_project_age AS SELECT amp_activity_id, project_age FROM (SELECT amp_activity_id, NULLIF((Extract(MONTH FROM rawdelta) + 12 * Extract(YEAR FROM rawdelta)) :: Integer,'0') AS project_age FROM (SELECT amp_activity_id, age(Now(), actual_start_date) AS rawdelta FROM amp_activity_version) AS rawvals) AS computed_vals WHERE project_age IS NOT NULL;
